medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain that started this morning after breakfast, associated with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning after breakfast. The patient had a similar self-limiting episode one week previously. Symptoms are not associated with fever or chills. No complaints of dysuria, shoulder pain, jaundice, or change in color of urine/stool.
